page.title: 02People of W. Buckfastleigh
page.content: The residents of the area are very self-sufficient, and rely to a great extent on the produce of their own gardens. Many of the older inhabitants have lived in the parish all their lives, while the younger ones tend to have moved in more recently, and to be making conspicuous efforts to improve their properties. This group seems to be more mobile, and houses change hands fairly frequently. They take a keen interest in local affairs, and play a key part in parish council business and on the twinning committee.
